name: Axe, Battle
description: A heavy-headed axe between 3 to 5 feet in length. Features the Flex property, allowing for increased damage when wielded with two hands.

name: Axe, Hand
description: A small axe between 1 to 2 feet in length. Can be used in melee or thrown with a range of 10/30 yards.

name: Bow, Composite
description: A 64-inch recurved bow designed for high tension. Effective range of 80/160/240 yards.

name: Bow, Short Composite
description: A compact 40-inch recurved bow. Effective range of 60/120/180 yards.

name: Bow, Long
description: A 76-inch straight bow. Effective range of 70/140/210 yards.

name: Bow, Short
description: A 52-inch bow for light ranged combat. Effective range of 50/100/150 yards.

name: Crossbow, Heavy
description: A 36-inch powerful mechanical bow. Requires two hands to loose and reload. Range of 80/160/240 yards.

name: Crossbow, Light
description: A 24-inch mechanical bow. Can be loosed with one hand but requires two to reload. Range of 60/120/180 yards.

name: Dagger
description: A short-bladed weapon between 9 to 18 inches. Useful for melee or throwing (10/30 yard range).

name: Flail or Iron Bar
description: A bludgeoning weapon between 2.5 to 4 feet in length.

name: Halberd
description: A 6-foot polearm featuring both an axe head and a spike for versatile combat.

name: Lance
description: A 12-foot long spear designed for mounted charging.

name: Mace or Warhammer
description: A 2.5 to 4-foot bludgeoning tool. Features the Flex property for two-handed use.

name: Morning Star
description: A 2.5 to 4-foot spiked club. Features the Flex property for two-handed use.

name: Pike
description: An exceptionally long polearm between 15 to 25 feet, primarily for stationary defense.

name: Polearm
description: A 10-foot long reach weapon.

name: Javelin
description: A 6.5-foot light throwing spear. Range 15/30/45 yards.

name: Spear
description: A 7-foot versatile weapon for melee or throwing (10/30 yards). Features the Flex property.

name: Sword
description: A standard bladed weapon between 2 to 4 feet in length.

name: Sword, Two-handed
description: A massive 5 to 7-foot blade. Features the Flex property.

name: Whip
description: A 20-foot leather whip with a minimum attack range of 10 feet.

name: Sling
description: A leather strap for hurling stones. Range 40/80/160 yards.

name: Arrow, Silver
description: A single arrow fitted with a head of solid silver.

name: Arrows
description: A bundle of 20 arrows, 32 inches in length.

name: Quiver
description: A leather shoulder-strapped container for 20 arrows.

name: Quarrels
description: A bundle of 30 16-inch bolts for use with crossbows.

name: Quarrel Case
description: A wooden shoulder-strapped container for 30 quarrels.

name: Sling Stone Pouch
description: A small leather pouch for carrying up to 20 sling stones.

name: Sling Stones
description: A set of 20 smooth stones for use with a sling.

name: Backpack
description: Leather storage pack with a fastening top flap. Holds up to 800cn.

name: Dungeoneer's Plank
description: Interlocking wooden plank measuring 5ft x 6in x 2in.

name: Dungeoneer's Pole
description: Interlocking 10-foot wooden pole with a 2-inch diameter.

name: Herbs
description: Various botanicals such as belladonna, pennyroyal, or sage.

name: Holy Symbol, Silver
description: Solid silver consecrated icon (6in x 2in x 0.5in).

name: Holy Symbol, Wood
description: Consecrated wooden icon (12in x 4in x 1in).

name: Holy Water
description: 3oz of blessed water in a glass vial.

name: Lamp / Lantern
description: Tin illumination device with a hanging loop. Weighs 20cn when empty.

name: Mallet
description: 14-inch wooden striking tool.

name: Mirror, Silvered
description: 3-inch diameter glass disk with a silver coating.

name: Mirror, Steel
description: 6-inch diameter polished steel disk.

name: Oil Flask
description: 34oz ceramic bottle of lamp oil. Weighs 5cn when empty.

name: Rope
description: 50-foot length of 1-inch diameter plant fiber cordage.

name: Rope, Silk
description: 50-foot length of 0.5-inch diameter lightweight silk cordage.

name: Sack, Large
description: Canvas cinch-top bag (2ft x 4ft) with 800cn capacity.

name: Sack, Small
description: Canvas cinch-top bag (12in x 12in) with 200cn capacity.

name: Salt, Coarse
description: Leather pouch (6in x 6in) of coarse salt. 1cn empty.

name: Spikes
description: Set of 10 8-inch iron spikes for securing doors or terrain.

name: Tinderbox
description: Steel kit with a flint striker for starting fires.

name: Torches
description: Set of 6 2-foot wooden rods with fuel reservoirs. Provides 30 minutes of light each.

name: Rations, Iron
description: 7 individual tin-boxed meals that do not spoil.

name: Rations, Standard
description: 7-day supply of food with a 14-day spoilage period.

name: Waterskin / Wineskin
description: Container for 68oz of liquid. 6cn when empty.

name: Wine
description: 68oz of moderate quality wine.

name: Leather Armor
description: Light defensive suit (AC 7). Allows for quiet movement and is the maximum weight for Magic-User casting.

name: Chain Mail
description: Suit of interlocking metal rings (AC 5). Heavy construction hinders stealth.

name: Plate Mail
description: Heavy defensive suit of metal plates (AC 3). Impossible to move quietly.

name: Full Plate
description: Complete suit of articulated plate armor (AC 2). Reduces agility.

name: Shield
description: Round 1.5-foot diameter defense. Provides a -1 AC bonus.

name: Heater Shield
description: Large shield (3ft x 2ft) providing a -2 AC bonus to the forward 90Â° arc.

name: Helmet
description: Standard head protection. Negates the criticality of head hits.

name: Visored Helmet
description: Enclosed helm providing a -1 AC bonus and head hit non-criticality; impairs hearing and sight.

name: Chain Coif
description: Mail neck protection. Negates the criticality of neck hits.

name: Horse, Draft
description: Powerful equine with 8,000cn load capacity. Travels 20 miles per day.

name: Horse, Light
description: Fast equine with 4,000cn load capacity. Travels 50 miles per day.

name: Horse, Medium
description: Balanced equine with 6,000cn load capacity. Travels 40 miles per day.

name: Horse, Heavy
description: Robust warhorse with 8,000cn load capacity. Travels 30 miles per day.

name: Donkey / Mule
description: Sturdy beast of burden with 6,000cn load capacity. Travels 15 miles per day.

name: Saddle
description: Leather seat for mounts, sized per breed.

name: Saddle Bags
description: Two leather bags with flaps; provides 400cn storage capacity per bag.

name: Chain Barding
description: Interlocking ring armor for horse-sized mounts (AC 5).

name: Plate Barding
description: Metal plate armor for horse-sized mounts (AC 3).

name: Charcoal / Chalk Rod
description: An 8-inch marking rod for writing on various surfaces.

name: Ink Vial, Black
description: Glass vial containing 3.5oz of black ink. 1cn when empty.

name: Ink Vial, Red
description: Glass vial containing 3.5oz of red ink. 1cn when empty.

name: Journal
description: Softbound book (7in x 11in x 2in) with 100 pages. Used for notes or spell transcription.

name: Paper
description: 5 sheets of heavyweight 14in x 22in parchment.

name: Pencil
description: 8-inch wooden rod with a charcoal center.

name: Spell Book
description: Hardbound tome (14in x 22in x 4in) with 200 pages. Required for Magic-User spells.

name: Pounce
description: Tin container of powder used to dry ink. 1cn when empty.

name: Quill
description: 8-inch swan feather writing instrument.

name: Cart
description: Two-wheeled wooden transport with a 20,000cn capacity. Divides pull force required by 6.

name: Wagon
description: Four-wheeled wooden transport with a 40,000cn capacity. Divides pull force required by 5.

name: Carriage
description: Four-wheeled wooden transport with a 35,000cn capacity. Divides pull force required by 5.

name: Boat
description: 12-foot wooden watercraft with 8,000cn capacity; includes four oars.

name: Raft
description: 6-foot wooden platform with 8,000cn capacity; includes two oars.

name: Barber Kit
description: A wooden case containing a scalpel, scissors, forceps, and a suture set.

name: Climbing Kit
description: Specialized gear including 10 pitons, a hammer, 2 picks, and 2 crampons.

name: Cooking Kit
description: Includes 2 cutlery sets, a 12-inch skillet, a 100oz pot, and a 4-foot tripod.

name: Dungeoneer Kit
description: Comprehensive set including a hammer, 2 dungeoneer's planks, 2 dungeoneer's poles, and 10 spikes.

name: Fishing Kit
description: Includes a wooden pole, 100 feet of silk line, 2 lures, and 4 hooks.

name: Locksmith Kit
description: A leather case containing 6 lock picks, 4 files, and 4 probes.

name: Sewing Kit
description: A wooden case containing 10 needles and 50 feet of cotton thread.

name: Writing Kit
description: A leather case containing a black ink vial, pencil, charcoal rod, and a quill.

name: Amulet, Brooch, Circlet, Pendant
description: Various personal jewelry items.

name: Armlet, Bracelet, Large Gem, Wand
description: Larger jewelry items, gems, or magical wands.

name: Cuff, Diadem, Modest Crown, Rod, Tiara
description: Elaborate headwear, heavy jewelry, or magical rods.

name: Mid-sized Gem, Large Pearl, Set Ring
description: Common precious stones and rings.

name: Small Gem, Mid-sized Pearl, Unset Ring
description: Minor precious items.

name: Bejeweled Crown, Sceptre, Staff, Stave
description: High-value regalia and magical staves.

name: Bread
description: A circular loaf of bread with a 12-inch diameter.

name: Butter
description: 8oz of bovine, goat, or sheep butter in a ceramic jar. 5cn when empty.

name: Candle
description: A 3in x 6in tallow pillar candle with a 36-hour burn time.

name: Cheese
description: A 16oz wedge of cloth-wrapped bovine, goat, or sheep cheese.

name: Grain
description: A burlap sack of assorted cereal crops such as wheat, rice, or oats.

name: Lard / Tallow
description: 32oz of fat in a wooden lidded box. 10cn when empty.

name: Salt, Fine
description: A parchment envelope of finely granulated salt.

name: Twine
description: 150-foot spool of 3-ply twisted cordage.

name: Bed Roll
description: A wool and down sleeping roll (7ft x 3ft).

name: Blanket
description: A 6ft x 4ft wool blanket.

name: Grappling Hook
description: A 12-inch 4-clawed steel hook for climbing.

name: Hammer
description: A 15-inch tool with a steel head and wooden handle.

name: Sulfur Matches
description: A wooden case containing 25 3-inch sulfur matches.

name: Spade
description: A 4-foot digging tool with a steel head and wooden handle.

name: Stakes
description: A set of 12 1-foot long wooden stakes.

name: Tar Palling
description: A 10ft x 10ft sheet of heavy tarred and waxed canvas.

name: Tent, Large
description: A 50ft x 15ft waxed canvas tent; includes 20ft of rope, 20 stakes, and 20 poles.

name: Tent, Small
description: A 7ft x 5ft waxed canvas tent; includes 10ft of rope, 5 stakes, and 5 poles.
